summary: Combining real and fictional events, this movie centers around the historic 1986 World Series, and a day in the life of a playwright who skips opening night to watch the momentous game.
cast: Michael Keaton|Robert Downey Jr.|Ari Graynor|Bebe Neuwirth|Griffin Dunne|Shalom Harlow|Nadia Dajani|Harris Yulin|Roger Rees|Tom Aldredge|Lillias White|Amir Ali Said|Catherine O'Hara|Rock Kohli|John Tormey|Frank Ciornei|Uzi Parnes|Neal Jones|Andrew Benator|Paul Woodburn|Arnie Burton|Patrick Ssenjovu|Harry Bugin|Bobby Steggert|Ken Barnett|Wade Mylius|Eric Zuckerman|David Guion|Blackie|Zack Abramowitz|Roger Clemens|Bern Cohen|Danny Doherty|Elli|Chuck Gerena|Christopher Jon Gombos|Jeffrey Grossman|Susan Lay|Matt Lish|Gary Lee Mahmoud|Chiko Mendez|Nancy Otero|Loukas Papas|Keith P. title: Game 6
